name: interbreeding
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of breeding or causing animals to breed with members of another breed or group: Neanderthals simply disappeared through interbreeding with the modern newcomers. The main threat to the species is interbreeding with rainbow trout. See
interbreed
More examplesFewer examplesThey are trying to improve the productivity of Brazilian bees through scientifically controlled interbreeding.We must prevent further interbreeding and competition with wild fish.The fish-farming industry may harm the wild salmon stocks' recovery by interbreeding.
